# codementor-ai

Codementor AI is an AI-powered coding assistant designed to provide real-time code suggestions, debugging tips, and explanations for multiple programming languages. Built with React, TypeScript, and Vite, it caters to users from beginners to advanced developers by offering step-by-step guidance, advanced optimizations, and error detection. The platform integrates ChatGPTâ€™s API to enable interactive conversational coding assistance, helping users generate code snippets and receive personalized coding advice.
